review: My mother had an ulcer so met the doctor. ****** *** **** *** spoke well. Consultation was fine with the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor.

review: The doctor was very friendly and thorough in his examination. Very responsive and patient throughout the consultation. Put me at ease during physical examination. Would highly recommend this doctor.
